To collapse in a sugar cane Suck it sweet to kill the pain There was someone I was looking for There is no more My tongue is weak from a kick or two The word is dry, I think of you Tie my face to the back of a jet To keep my essence there

And its been a week And its been a week too long There are several things that I’ve been doing wrong You see the time it takes for you Is the time it takes for me So don’t agree

If it’s late then I will go Turn the lights out, turn it slow Like you turned me upside down And faced the ground Spinnin’ left I spin at you Listen girl I think of you Back up by the back of the chair I left you there

And its been a week And its been a week too long There are several things that I’ve been doing wrong You see the time it takes for you Is the time it takes for me So don’t agree

You can be my destiny You can mean that much to me You can be my destiny You can mean that much to me You can be my destiny You can mean that much to me You can be my destiny You can mean that much to me You can be my destiny
